title: $2250 2 Bd/ 2Ba Modern/New Apartment Available Oct 1st
description:
Hi there!
Beautiful, bright, spacious 2 bedroom/2bath in South Philly/East Passyunk on Broad Street. See below for the lowdown!
- south facing unit on the top floor with beautiful views of Philly
- spacious bedrooms with great closet space
- 2 full bathrooms
- secured/gated parking garage with key-code entry
- roof deck with 360 views of Philly!
- AC/Heat
- in unit washer/dryer
- 2 door refrigerator (with filtered water and ice dispenser)
- open floor plan kitchen, built in island and stainless steel appliances
- garbage disposal and dishwasher
- 2 large elevators for easy move-in/ move-out
- online rent payments and easy online portal for maintenance requests
- discounts at local gyms
- 2 blocks from target, sprouts, starbucks, chipotle and fine wine/good spirits
- 5mins from Columbus Park
- 10mins from Passyunk Ave restaurants, shops and bars, and the Italian Market!
- 1/2 block from Federal Street subway station
My husband and I are moving to New Jersey, and with permission from our landlord, we are looking for tenants on their behalf :) This apartment has been an incredible home for us, we're actually pretty sad to be leaving it, but it's time! If you're interested please email to schedule a viewing and if you'd like to submit an application after that, we will refer you to the landlord. They're reliable and fast and easy to work with!
Thanks for your interest!

title: NEWLY RENOVATED UNITS AT EMERSON APARTMENTS
description:
EMERSON APARTMENTS
We are located in the greater northeast section of Philadelphia right off of Bustleton
Avenue with Evarts as the cross street. Our apartments are fully renovated with brand
new kitchens and bathrooms! Parking lot in the rear of the building and laundry facilities on site!
Don’t miss this opportunity to find the home you will love!
We are open for viewing Monday through Friday 10:00 am to 4:00 pm.
Please give us a call to schedule an appointment. Applications are on site.
You may bring along the following so you can apply the same day:
1. The application fee in the form of a money order. The
application fee is $75. This covers up to two applicants.
Any adult moving in MUST be on the application.
2. Proof of your monthly income such as, pay stubs, SSI/SSDI award
letter or statement of pension payments. We do not accept bank
statements as proof of income. We must be able to verify your income.
3. A copy of your social security card and ID as proof of your identity.
In order to qualify for an apartment, your credit report must have no relevant
landlord tenant filings or evictions. In addition, you cannot have any kind of arrest record.
Your income needs to be two and a half times
the cost of the rent.
**You will need to make your own copies**
Once you are approved for residency, you will need to pay one month's
security to hold the apartment. An apartment takes about three to five
weeks to make ready to move in. Once the apartment is ready, we
require an additional two months of rent: first and last month's rent.
ONE BEDROOM APARTMENTS FOR $1100 PER MONTH *(Available 8/1)*
TWO BEDROOM APARTMENTS $1300 PER MONTH *(10/1)*

title: MOVE-IN SPECIAL! Luxury 3BD/3Bath New Construction House
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants. Ask us about our Move-In special for August 2022!

title: Studio Apt Home with Wood Floors on Rittenhouse Square, Roof Deck, Gym
description:
The studio apartment home at 2210 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 22nd floor features large windows that face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as September 2, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, and Sprouts. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, and Paper Source. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, or Pietro's. Savor a coffee at La Colombe or Alchemy. Have a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in french ice cream at nearby Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then grab a baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Buy a brookie from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theatres. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!

title: Renovated Studio Apartment Home, Wood Floors, City View, Package Room
description:
The studio apartment home at 2005 is available for lease at this moment! This 425 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 20th floor features large windows that face north and have a city view. You may gaze upon skyscrapers like Mellon Center, Comcast Center, One Liberty Place, and Two Liberty Place. This renovated kitchen features white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as November 10, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, and Sprouts. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, and Paper Source. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, or Pietro's. Savor a coffee at La Colombe, Ultimo, Alchemy, or Elixr. Have a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then buy a baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Grab scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9 to 2. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* Package lockers
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Top-of-the-line fitness center with park view
* Sauna
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Bike storage
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Nightly guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and concierge desk staff
* 24/7 maintenance
* Laundry room on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Studio apartment home on 20th floor
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen countertops
* Wood floor
* Large north-facing windows
* City skyline view
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
Wondering if this home is still available? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 2005 is still listed under the Dali floor plan! Please make an appointment to tour with Michelle using ResMate, our chatbot concierge, on our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com 24/7. Live virtual tours in Zoom available!

201 South 18th Street
Philadelphia, PA 19103

title: Welcome home to your new Center City abode!
description: Welcome home to your new Center City abode! Get ready to live by all of the best things the city has to offer. Steps from one of the City's favorite grocery stores, Mom's Organic, the up and coming Fashion District, and some of the best eateries Philadelphia has to offer, you will have no reason to leave the neighborhood. Step into this condo and immediately notice the extra large closet, great for coats and all of your storage needs. Head down the bright hall way to be greeted by the open living and dining area finished with hardwood floors.. The open concept is full of natural light and fantastic for entertaining. The kitchen, that boasts enough counter space for even your most ambitious chef, and stainless steel appliances, over looks the living area. The breakfast bar, big enough to seat four, leaves the living room open for cozy hangs. No need for a formal dining room table! Head into the nicely sized bedroom and note even more storage. Check out the bathroom, with a bathtub, shower combination and plenty of counter space. Head out and don't forget to check out the amenities including a gym, lounge area, and outdoor pet area! FYI-Parking in building currently available for rent. Also parking in garage across the street for approx $260/mo

title: 2 Bed Condo for Rent in Naval Square. Garage Parking!
description:
Grow Property Management offers this upgraded 2 bedroom 2 bath Condo unit in Strickland Row! Perfect first floor location with a GARAGE PARKING spot directly out the back door of the building! This unit has been significantly upgraded and unlike most, now has hardwood floors THROUGHOUT the unit, not just in the living space! The kitchen features stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and a marble back-splash, a large island, and a gas range. Both bedrooms are separated by the open floor plan living/dining space, ideal for roommates. The unit has recessed lighting, beautiful crown moldings and is move-in ready! The laundry room with ample storage is conveniently located between the second bedroom and the second bath. Also included is a sperate storage locker located on the same floor. It is walking distance to shops, restaurants, grocery stores and coffee houses along the South Street Corridor, and a short walk to University of Pennsylvania Hospital as well as Children's Hospital. Enjoy professionally landscaped grounds and a large gym and beautiful in-ground pool in this pet-friendly complex!
Naval Square is a historic community; with beautiful grounds and grand buildings. All kept pristine with a front gatekeeper, & groundsmen. It has off-street parking, a community center, fitness center & a pool.
THE PHILADELPHIA NAVAL SQUARE NEIGHBORHOOD:
• Exceptional Walk Score & Immediate Public Transportation
• Immediate to Coffee Shops, Gastro Pubs, Breweries, Parks
• Close to Restaurants, Shopping, On/Off Highway Ramps
• Gated Community, Off Street Parking
• Amenities Like A Pool, Manicured Grounds
SERVICES:
• Managed by Grow Property Management | www.GrowPropertyManagement.com

You can schedule now, an instant self-showing. It can be at the time & day best for you. Visit our website at www.GrowPropertyManagement.com and select this property on our available properties tab. Please complete the contact info and details sections to be able to view the property.

This home is for sale but could be a rent-to-own property for you. My name is Nathan Hodson I am a PA Realtor with Keller Williams Real Estate - Langhorn. I partner with a program that does Rent To Own properties. Look over the starting qualifications. You MUST meet all 4 of them to attempt to get approved for this program. If you do not meet all 4 then wait until you do to reach out to me. It is a free application.
Your questions
1.	Do I make $30,000 a year or more?
2.	Is my credit score 550+?
3.	Do I have $6,000 or more in savings?
4.	Do I have no evictions, no late rent payments, no car repossessions, or no recurring overdrafts in the past year, and no bankruptcy?
Again you must be able to answer "YES" to all questions. If you can't then wait till you can. I look forward to speaking with you. What I will need from you is your First & Last name, Phone Number, & Email address of anyone 18+ that will be living in the home.
